    <h1>Bloum</h1>
    <strong>An unstyled, lightweight yet powerful web components library with customization capabilities.</strong>
    <br>
    <br>
    <div align="center">
      <img alt="size" src="https://img.shields.io/bundlephobia/minzip/bloum?style=for-the-badge">
